name: Damn the Dam
description:
We are working in this dam that is going to fall apart soon, the village below has to evacuate and we have to repair the dam until the evacuation is complete. We will lose if we fall or if we don't manage to close the holes in time, we will be moving through platforms with a harpoon aiming at the circles and pressing E and we will repair the holes by going in front of the hole and keeping F pressed for 4 seconds.

This game was made by:

Haridas Ghesini (Design/3D artist)

Sofia Bolognesi (Concept art)

Michael Rizzolo (Programmer)

Davide Gobbo (Programmer) : https://progradeburning.itch.io/

Filippo Calmasini (Programmer)

for the Global Game Jam 2020.

The project is still under development, so feel free to report the bufìg you find.

Bugs alredy known:

- You cannot use the hook while jumping

- The animations bugg very often
